title: Treatment Of Respiratory Viruses
content:
Seek health care right away for
testing
and/or treatment if you believe you may have a respiratory virus (if you feel sick or tested positive for one) and you
have risk factors for severe illness
. If you have flu or COVID-19, treatment may be an option to make your symptoms less severe and shorten the time you are sick. Treatment needs to be started within a few days of when your symptoms begin.
